    • isUserMemberOfCompany

      public boolean isUserMemberOfCompany(UUID companyId, String bearerToken) throws org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException
      Check if a user is a member of the company.
      Parameters:
      companyId - : the id of the company.
      bearerToken - : the token of the user.
      Returns:
      true if the user is a member of the company, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException - if the user microservice returns an error.
